name: HostDispatch
author: Satrap Darabi

sections.description:
As a blogger it really is essential to keep up to date with the happenings of the hosting industry and how it may affect you and your blog. But who has time to read all the different web hosting related blogs and review sites nowadays!? That’s where HostDispatch comes in. We bring you all the latest news and reviews from the web hosting industry and give it to you right in your WP dashboard, saving you time while keeping you updated with the latest on http://hostdispatch.com.

Feature requests and ideas welcome: satrap@hostdispatch.com
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin.

  2. Activate it.

  3. Check your dashboard to see it in action.

short_description: HostDispatch creates a dashboard widget that displays the RSS feed from hostdispatch.com
